routes.documentation: Creates a new bank account in core banking system

responses.body:
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Account creation failed",
    "code": "validation_error",
    "description": "Account data validation failed"
  },
  "failureReason": "invalid_account_name",
  "failureCategory": "validation_error",
  "canRetry": true,
  "retryAfter": 300,
  "maxRetries": 3,
  "recommendations": [
    "Please check your account information and try again",
    "Account name must be between 1-50 characters"
  ],
  "supportReference": "{{faker 'string.uuid'}}"
}
responses.label: Account Creation Failed
